results.content: This course is a very good course.  I am an absolute beginner to web development and design.  It explained each step in detail and how every step works in building a web site.  I would recommend any one that has no web development or web design experience to take this course.

results.content: Awesome!! learnt lots for it, easy to follow.  Each lecture explained very well. Looking forward for animation addition. Thanks lots
results.content_html: Awesome!! learnt lots for it, easy to follow. Each lecture explained very well. Looking forward for animation addition. Thanks lots

results.content: I thought the course was excellent and very polished. Fortunately for me I have had some prior experience with HTML5 and CSS3 because he didn't always explain what properties did what. I liked that he often made his own buttons and elements rather than the canned Bootstrap 4 components which can get very boring quickly. As a visual artist, I prefer to work on projects that I would want to emulate. I'm not interested in just learning how the tools work. I need to see it in a real world environment. I took half a star away because he didn't talk about Sass or PHP forms. But considering the new things I did learn, the course was well worth it.

results.content:
Awesome course. Lecturer really knows his stuff. The Photoshop section was taught well and as I am new to PS I went through every step in order to get my muscle memory working. I have done a lot of html, css and JS myself previously so found this section easy to follow as methods unfamiliar to myself were introduced. I think a complete beginner would have issues following the coding section - but for myself I was very interested in how the superb effects such as the mobile menu worked. Note all the code and materials are available throughout the course. I did actually skip several steps but fact you can load a previous lessons final look and feel, allows you to focus on areas you would like to master yourself (adjusting code etc). I also reduced the speed of the lectures sometimes in order to see exactly how things were done at a pace I could follow.
Rob

Rob

results.content:
From this class I was expecting to learn how to create a design on Photoshop for a website and how to transform that design into code, or at least to learn new tricks on how to do it. Both these steps in this class where just shown instruction by instruction (as in "move down 100px"), without ever explaining why something was moved there or why that particular class of bootstrap was chosen. I knew already how to use Photoshop and I didn't learn anything new, but I believe that a beginner wouldn't learn anything good anyway, because the teacher never explains what he does, he just executes.
I would have preferred to design a much smaller site, but with less repetitive and more extensive explanations.
Compared to other classes I got (Webdeveloper bootcamp, advanced css and sass), this course isn't worth buying.

results.content:
A really great course.
I had little experience with web design and now I have the confidence to do the design from 0 to 100. I didn't know web design in photoshop is such easy! I don't think there are many courses to teach both web graphic design and coding such powerful, now I learned pro techniques to create awesome web page components, effects, etc. I'm looking forward for more from the instructor to learn more professional stuff easily.
I think the Instructor has done it well.

response.content: Thank you Anvar, I'm very glad to see you happy with the course.
